queries.query:
from(bucket: "nires_2025")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar_vehicle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "MC_ErrorFlags")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ecu"] == "MotorController")
  //|> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with 
      _value: 
        if (int(v: r._value) >= 256) then 9 //bit 8
        else if (int(v: r._value) >= 128) then 8 //bit 7
        else if (int(v: r._value) >= 64) then 7 //bit 6
        else if (int(v: r._value) >= 32) then 6 //bit 5
        else if (int(v: r._value) >= 16) then 5 //bit 4
        else if (int(v: r._value) >= 8) then 4 //bit 3
        else if (int(v: r._value) >= 4) then 3 //bit 2
        else if (int(v: r._value) >= 2) then 2 //bit 1
        else if (int(v: r._value) == 1) then 1 //bit 0
        else 0 //OK
    }))
